Creates a StreetSegmentItemRequestPacket.

Parameters:
packetID The packetID.
requestID The ID of the request that created the packet.
index The index of the packet, if it's the first or second..
lat The latitude of the TMC-point.
lon The latitude of the TMC-point.
originIP The IP number of the sender.
originPort The port number of the sender.
